name: No Place Like Home
author: Stephanie Leary

sections.description: Displays small icons next to the home page and posts page in the Edit Pages list.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the no-place-like-home directory to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

If your blog is set to show a page instead of posts as the site’s home page, a house icon should now appear next to the home page under Pages. If you have also chosen a page to show your most recent posts, it will have the pushpin icon next to the title.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the no-place-like-home directory to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

If your blog is set to show a page instead of posts as the site’s home page, a house icon should now appear next to the home page under Pages. If you have also chosen a page to show your most recent posts, it will have the pushpin icon next to the title.

short_description: Displays small icons next to the home page and posts page in the Edit Pages list.
description: Displays small icons next to the home page and posts page in the Edit Pages list.

screenshots.caption: The All Pages screen, with the home icon next to the home page set in Settings → Reading.
